# nacos_permission (Data Source)

Nacos permission data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nacos_permission" "example" {
  resource = "example_resource"
  action   = "READ"
}

output "permission_details" {
  value = data.nacos_permission.example
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `action` (String) Action to query (r, w, rw)
- `resource` (String) Resource to query, in the format of `<namespace_id>:<group>:<data_id>`
- `role_name` (String) Role name to query

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the permission, in the format of `<role_name>:<resource>:<action>`
